name: Apycom
title: jQuery Dropdown Menu
description: jQuery Dropdown Menu with stunning visual effects and animations. Unlimited levels; Full cross-browser compatibility; Fully accessible even when javascript is turned off, as a pure css menu; Search engines optimized; Clear unordered list (LI and UL HTML tags) structure of jQuery menu; Easy to setup and update; Fantastic animation and transition effects; Multiple pre-desinded color schemes; Completely customizable styling with CSS; Extremely small - 3kb uncompressed.
